reg_pit.title: Railway, Pipeline, Electric Power and Telecommunications Corporation Rights of Way Valuation Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 288/2009, effective November 30, 2009.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2008 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 373/2010, effective December 17, 2010.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2010 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 222/2011, effective December 5, 2011.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2011 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 392/2012, effective December 7, 2012.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2012 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 253/2013, effective December 11, 2013.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2013 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 233/2014, effective December 10, 2014.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2014 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 264/2015, effective December 23, 2015.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2015 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 317/2016 effective December 19, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2016 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 245/2017, effective December 20, 2017.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2017 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 283/2018, effective December 14, 2018.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2018 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 283/2019, effective December 18, 2019.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2019 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 299/2020, effective December 21, 2020.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2020 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 314/2021, effective December 1, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2021 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 260/2022, effective December 1, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2022 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 3, table BEFORE amended by BC Reg 288/2009, effective November 30, 2009.

tablerow.tablecol:

(a) described in section 1 (1) (c) (i) or (ii) of the Criteria for Railway

(b) south of the 59th parallel

section.sectiontext: The actual value of the right of way for the items in column 1 of the table must be determined using the rates set out opposite them in column 2:
